landing.hero_title: Radical Clarity for Your Internal Chaos
landing.hero_subtitle: STATUS CORE precisely identifies your current mental and emotional state to unlock your next level of performance.
landing.hero_anonymous: 100% Anonymous & Secure • No initial registration required
landing.how_it_works_subtitle: Three steps to understand what is blocking your potential.
landing.step1_desc: 21 deep questions based on cognitive science and high-level performance.
landing.step2_desc: We identify which of the 8 operational states you are in through our analysis engine.
landing.step3_desc: Detailed report with immediate practical actions to restore your alignment.
landing.methodology_desc: It's not just a questionnaire. It's a systemic algorithm that assesses the interconnection between Health, Work, Relations, Finances, Identity, Leisure, and Meaning.
landing.enterprise_desc: Reduce burnout and maximize operational clarity. Anonymous diagnostics for high-performance groups seeking the next level of alignment.
landing.footer_tagline: Advanced Personal Intelligence for High Performance.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.empty_desc: You haven't taken any assessment yet. Start now to discover your current state in 7 pillars.

assessment.title: State Diagnosis
assessment.question: Question
assessment.qualitative_desc: Describe freely how you feel today or what situation is currently draining your energy.

1.text: I feel I have enough physical energy to perform my activities without extreme exhaustion.

2.text: I have been getting good quality sleep and wake up feeling that my body has rested.

3.text: I can maintain emotional balance even when faced with stressful setbacks.

4.text: I feel that my current work has a clear meaning and contributes to something larger.

5.text: I am clear about my next professional growth goals.

6.text: I feel enthusiastic and appropriately challenged during my work routine.

7.text: I feel I have a solid support system in my relationships (family/friends).

8.text: I can express my needs and feelings clearly in my relationships.

9.text: I feel a sense of belonging and acceptance in the social groups I frequent.

10.text: I have peace of mind regarding my current financial stability.

11.text: I feel I have the autonomy to make financial decisions without excessive fear of the future.

12.text: My financial life is organized enough not to generate constant anxiety.

13.text: I am clear about my core values and act in accordance with them.

14.text: I feel self-confident about my capabilities and personal worth.

15.text: I practice self-respect and know how to set healthy boundaries to protect my identity.

16.text: I can fully disconnect from work and obligations during my downtime.

17.text: I have hobbies or leisure activities that bring me genuine fun and joy.

18.text: I feel my personal life is diverse and light, beyond responsibilities.

19.text: I feel a connection with something larger or an existential purpose that guides me.

20.text: My life makes sense to me on a deep level, beyond material success.

21.text: I regularly practice moments of reflection, meditation, or inner connection.

preview.title: Your Status
preview.empty_desc: Complete the assessment to see your result.
preview.premium_desc: Unlock the full Status Core v4 Platinum. Receive a 7-day tactical plan, antifragility analysis, and identify your biggest existential bottleneck.

report.title: Full Report
report.antifragility_desc: Systemic resilience based on Identity, Health, and Meaning.
report.unlock_desc: Get personalized AI analysis, 7-day plan, and antifragility metrics.
report.library_desc: Deep knowledge curation to accelerate your neuro-systemic evolution based on your Alpha Pillar.
report.risk_calculation_note: Risks calculated based on score inconsistency patterns.
report.resilience_desc: Your central system's ability to convert external pressure and chaos into growth and accelerated adaptation.
report.archetype_desc: This profile reflects a high level of execution, but with a support structure starting to show signs of systemic fatigue.
report.results_pilar_desc: A deep analysis of each fundamental area of your existence, prioritizing your biggest current bottleneck.
report.pilar_bottleneck_neural: Critical bottleneck identified by neural system
report.projection_desc: Neuro-systemic simulation based on your current state vs. application of the strategic plan.
report.trajectory_desc: With alpha bottleneck correction and systemic rebalancing.
report.inertia_desc: Maintaining current patterns and ignoring detected risk warnings.
report.forecast_quote: “In 90 days, your neural system will have adapted to the new pattern. Inertia today costs approximately 3x more recovery effort in the future.”
report.protocol_quote: “It doesn't matter what you've done until today. The protocol only requires that, in the next 7 days, you protect your Vital Energy like a treasure and execute your Impact Leverage like a biological command.”
report.golden_action_desc: We have identified the systemic game-changer for your current reality.

correlations.work_vs_health: High Work performance is suffocating your Physical Recovery.
correlations.finance_vs_rel: Financial instability is triggering reactivity in your Relationships.
correlations.id_vs_spir: Your strong Identity needs a higher Purpose to avoid existential emptiness.
correlations.vitality_brake: Your low Vitality is the main break for your mental clarity today.
correlations.harmony: Your pillars operate in relative systemic harmony.

login.title: Access your Diagnosis
login.description: Enter your email to save your history and unlock reports.
login.success_description: We sent an access link to your email address.
login.not_received: Didn't receive it? Check spam or try again.
login.agreement: By continuing, you agree to our {terms} and {privacy}.
